item.title: ‘aka Charlie Sheen’ Review: Netflix Doc Offers a Reflective but Exhausting Look at the Actor’s Stardom and Notoriety
item.description: Andrew Renzi’s two-part docuseries features Jon Cryer, Chuck Lorre, Denise Richards, Sean Penn and many more friends and loved ones.
